DOC.brief_summary: Randomised crossover study comparing the sensitivity and specificity of 5 External loop recorders in detecting pacemaker detected Atrial fibrillation burden.
DOC.brief_title: ELR Monitoring Against Permanent Pacemaker in Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of the study is to compare the diagnostic accuracy of the ZIO xt , MoMe, TECHNOMED pocket ECG and Nuubo to the R-test, our current standard clinical practice, in detection of AF burden, in patients with history of Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation and have a dual chamber pacemaker or ICD in situ, with sensitivity and specificity of AF detection calculated from the implanted pacemaker monitored beat to beat holters.
DOC.criteria: History of Atrial Fibrillation Dual chamber pacemaker with advanced holter arrhythmia diagnostics Previous AV node ablation
